metadata.synopsis: The caretaker warns the player to not touch the egg.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get seen near the egg in the Hatchery without permission. If you have received permission, this does not play at all.

0.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
0.text: Do not think you can take liberties because you are kin - stay away from the egg.
0.context: NodeContext: Getting annoyed now, a little aggressive; protective of the egg

1.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
1.text: Istik, I will not warn you again - get away from the egg.
1.context: NodeContext: Aggressive, protective of the egg; great emphasis on "get away from the egg"

2.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
2.text: It is forbidden to approach the egg, kin. You will respect our rules.
2.context: NodeContext: Urgent, a little aggressive; protective of the egg

3.speaker: Varsh Ko'kuu
3.text: Do not approach the egg, istik! It is strictly forbidden.
